data.body: as you cycle up and down the table on /beads, it stutters because either the id or the title width/height properties are changing.  this is annoying to the user, we should find a way to make the display consistent and jitter free.
data.description: as you cycle up and down the table on /beads, it stutters because either the id or the title width/height properties are changing.  this is annoying to the user, we should find a way to make the display consistent and jitter free.
data.title: table column widths jitter when cycling up/down
